item.description:
Looking forward to seeing everyone for discussions in Italian. What's your favorite Italian food?

We will meet upstairs at Cafe Paradiso. John Jordan's classes are finished for the summer. Finally, I will able to join the group once again. The last couple of meetings have had a great turnout and I have been jealous that I have not been able to attend.

I will see you all then.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano

item.name: The Boston Italian Language June 18 Meetup
